page.title: 13Tourism in Sampford Courtney
page.content: Sampford Courtney has a Camp Site on the outskirts and many visitors come into the village. However,there is no special provision for Tourists.The Village Post Office, as the only shop,benefits from tourism.There are no outward signs of Bed and Breakfast Boards,although some of the farms take in visitors. Talking to the residents we got the impression that they quite liked people walking round admiring the place,but not the litter they dropped, nor the noise they made.In fact, they would rather the average tourist did not come,only those who were able to appreciate the beauty of the village and behave with proper decorum.
